TopicTitle: Problem with patched conics and orbital telemetry after ascent from Mun

Articles.Content:
My Munar module ascent module aren't shown i had problem with rendezvous it's with CM/CSM on Mun orbit, why?

 

 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cZr2hlJPiSc

You mean the trajectory isn’t showing?

it’s a known bug, the current workaround is to use the cheat menu or to edit the save file (shown in the comments of the bug report):

If you save before launch or its an close savegame its probably faster to reload. Game tend to save then you land or kerbal leaves or enter capsule. 
That is that I always do then this bug show up.
But i didn't know why after i launched from Mun it's no orbital path over Mun of the ascent module
